actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to provide that the effective date of the amendment made by section 505(a) of such act (relating to exclusion for sick pay) shall only apply with respect to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1976.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit the application of the Tax Reform Act's elimination of the sick pay exclusion for persons who have not retired on total disability, to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to provide that the effective date of the amendment made by section 505(a) of such act (relating to exclusion for sick pay) shall only apply with respect to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1976.
